channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blow Your Mind
channel.desc: Dr Chris and Dr Xand van Tulleken bring you the top experts on the planet to show you things that will blow your mind. In this episode they find out about brainy birds. Chris Packham meets a clever crow called 007 and a resourceful raven called Bran. Also, discover who will win the raven v dog v human, battle of the brains contest.
